segments.text: I feel a wave of concern as I watch the boy climb higher, risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, focused on her plate like it’s the only thing that matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A part of me wants to shout for her to pay attention, to warn her of the impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is a disaster waiting to happen, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the contrast between the serene garden outside and the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl standing by, her excitement palpable as she waits for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocence is sweet, but that stool looks like it could tip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
